sense.def: Pathological Condition writing error of mi zheng 米癥 , rice concretion-illness. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry jing 粳 quoting Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 11: 米癥常欲食米 , “[Patients with] rice concretion-illness permanently wish to eat rice”, writes: 米瘕嗜米 , “[Patients with] rice conglomera tion-illness love to consume rice”. Mi jie 秘結 , closed and bound [6]

IS, Pathological Condition identical with da bian mi 大便秘 , constipation. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 27: 飲食將 息過熱，熱氣蘊積秘結 , “After one has consumed beverages and food that are too hot, heat qi will accumulate and [the passageways of stools will be] closed and bound ”.
